Body.Content:
In late October 2025, we are removing the sendDeviceOwnershipChangePushNotification property from the Microsoft Graph Beta API. This property is no longer relevant as notifications are sent to users upon device ownership change from personal to corporate regardless.

How this will affect your organization:

If you are referencing the sendDeviceOwnershipChangePushNotification property in custom scripts or tools, this property will no longer be available once the property is removed.

What you need to do to prepare:

Update custom scripts or tools, as needed. Otherwise, no action is required.

Details.Name: Summary
Details.Value: The sendDeviceOwnershipChangePushNotification property will be removed from the Microsoft Graph Beta API in late October 2025. Update any custom scripts or tools referencing this property, as notifications for device ownership changes are now sent automatically. No other action is needed.

Title: Plan for Change: Removal of Microsoft Graph Beta API sendDeviceOwnershipChangePushNotification property
